metadata.title: AI Environment Setup + Arrays & Hashing + Real ML System Integration
metadata.neetcode_pattern: Arrays, Hash Maps, AI-powered learning setup
metadata.ml_focus: Hash tables in embeddings, YouTube Recommendation System analysis

objectives: Set up AI-powered learning environment (Claude Pro, ChatGPT Plus)
Complete 25 array and hashing problems with 90%+ accuracy
Master fundamental data structures used in ML systems
Establish daily study routine with AI coaching integration
Understand hash tables in embeddings and recommendation systems

morning_session.title: AI Ecosystem Bootstrap + Core Array Problems
activities: Set up AI learning environment (Claude Pro, ChatGPT Plus)
Configure VS Code with AI extensions
AI-powered Anki setup with ML-DS&A prompt templates

problems.name: Two Sum
problems.description: Find two numbers that add up to a target sum
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Explain Two Sum using hash tables like vocabulary mappings in tokenizers. How does this relate to attention mechanisms in transformers?

problems.name: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
problems.description: Find maximum profit from stock transactions
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Relate this to gradient optimization and finding optimal points in ML training curves.

problems.name: Contains Duplicate
problems.description: Check if array contains duplicates
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: AI coaching on set operations vs hash tables in data preprocessing pipelines.

evening_session.title: AI Study Setup + ML System Deep Dive
activities: Create personalized AI study buddy prompts
Set up GitHub repository with AI-generated README
ML System Study: YouTube Recommendations - hash tables for user/video embeddings

morning_session.title: Hash Maps Deep Dive + ML Applications
activities: Hash table theory with AI explanations connecting to PyTorch dict operations
Python dict internals, collision handling, and performance optimization
AI-generated flashcards for hash table complexity and ML applications

problems.name: Valid Anagram
problems.description: Check if two strings are anagrams
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Connect to text preprocessing in NLP and character frequency analysis in transformer tokenization.

problems.name: Group Anagrams
problems.description: Group strings that are anagrams
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Relate to clustering algorithms in ML and feature hashing for dimensionality reduction.

problems.name: Top K Frequent Elements
problems.description: Find k most frequent elements

evening_session.title: Implementation Practice + AI Mock Interview
activities: Implement custom hash table class with AI assistance

problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Relate to backpropagation in neural networks and gradient computation excluding current layer.

problems.name: Valid Sudoku

problems.name: Encode and Decode Strings
problems.description: Design algorithm to encode and decode strings
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Relate to tokenization and encoding schemes in NLP models like BERT and GPT.

evening_session.title: AI-Enhanced Problem Analysis + Contest Prep
activities: AI-guided complexity analysis of solved problems

activities: Advanced hash map patterns in ML systems
Distributed hash tables in large-scale ML pipelines

problems.description: Find length of longest consecutive elements sequence
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Connect to sequence modeling in RNNs and finding patterns in time series data.

problems.name: 4Sum
problems.description: Find all unique quadruplets that sum to target
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Relate to multi-dimensional optimization problems in ML hyperparameter tuning.

activities: Design a distributed cache system using consistent hashing
ML System Case Study: Netflix's recommendation engine hash optimizations
Performance analysis and scaling considerations

morning_session.title: Contest Simulation + Review
activities: LeetCode weekly contest simulation with AI real-time coaching
Pattern recognition across all solved problems

problems.name: 3Sum
problems.description: Find all unique triplets that sum to zero
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Connect to clustering problems in ML and finding optimal combinations in feature selection.

problems.name: Container With Most Water
problems.description: Find two lines that form container with most water

problems.name: Maximum Subarray
problems.description: Find contiguous subarray with largest sum
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Connect to sliding window optimization in signal processing and feature extraction in ML.

problems.description: Count subarrays with sum equal to k
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Relate to prefix sums in computational graphs and cumulative feature aggregation.

problems.name: Longest Substring with At Most K Distinct Characters
problems.description: Find longest substring with at most k distinct characters
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Connect to vocabulary size constraints in NLP and feature diversity in recommendation systems.

problems.name: Find All Anagrams in a String
problems.description: Find all anagram substrings in a string
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Relate to pattern matching in sequence data and n-gram analysis in NLP.

problems.name: Insert Delete GetRandom O(1)
problems.description: Design data structure with O(1) insert, delete, and random
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Connect to sampling techniques in ML and efficient data structures for training data management.

project_session.title: AI-Enhanced Hash Table Implementation
activities: Implement production-ready hash table with ML-inspired optimizations
Add dynamic resizing with load balancing strategies

activities: LeetCode Virtual Contest participation with AI real-time coaching

Plan Week 2 focus areas and AI coaching adjustments

problems.name: Design HashMap
problems.description: Design a hash map data structure
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Focus on collision handling and performance optimization techniques used in ML frameworks.

problems.description: Design a hash set data structure
problems.ai_coaching_prompt: Compare with bloom filters and other probabilistic data structures used in ML.

sunday.deliverable: Week 1 comprehensive review with AI progress analysis and Week 2 optimization plan

ai_prompts.text: I'm solving array and hashing problems. Given my ML background: 1) What patterns should I recognize from my research experience? 2) How does this relate to algorithms I've used in PyTorch/NumPy? 3) What's the most efficient implementation approach? 4) Generate 2 similar problems for practice.

Review my solution for: 1) Time/space complexity optimization opportunities 2) Edge cases I might miss from my research background 3) Alternative approaches using ML algorithm thinking 4) How this pattern appears in production ML systems

Conduct a technical interview: 1) Ask a medium array/hashing problem with ML context 2) Evaluate my problem-solving communication 3) Provide follow-up optimization questions 4) Grade like a FAANG interviewer (1-10 scale)

Explain how this data structure/algorithm connects to ML: 1) What ML concepts use similar patterns? 2) How is this optimized in ML frameworks like PyTorch? 3) Real-world applications in recommendation systems, NLP, computer vision 4) Performance considerations in large-scale ML systems

ml_systems_focus.hash_table_usage: User embeddings, video embeddings, feature hashing for scalability
Feature storage, user interaction history, content caching
study_materials: Hash table optimizations for low latency

ml_systems_focus.hash_table_usage: Content metadata, user preferences, collaborative filtering
Property features, user search patterns, ranking factors
